attributes.action: people’s vote, options, leave No deal, PM deal, revoke article 50
attributes.additional_details: Today’s votes with MPs only wanting to give Teresa mays deal or revoke article 50, that’s not what people voted for, if parliament can’t decide the people should.
attributes.background: The country is done with parliament you are not making any decisions in the country’s interests. I think the country should decide on the future not the EU, they have made a mockery of us on the world stage
